title: Failed to Create Dump File Error:183
body: How can I fix this error can someone please tell me,I have no connection problems or something like that and this happens to me since this patch came V7.6-4115265.4140304 and it happens quite often,please help ty :)

replies.body: This error can happen if your bugsplat error fails to yield logs.  There may have been another error that was missed about a connection problem, assuming this happened in champion select.  Let me know exactly where this happened and if you saw any other errors, and I'd be happy to help!

Having the same issue since the newest patch. Alpha client, no connection issues, and it soft crashes only if i have enough time I can get back in the lobby; if not its a dodge and it is so annoying. Happens constantly.

I've been having the same issue, also no connection problems.
It mostly occurs in champion select, though it's also happened once in a custom game lobby.

Happened to me as well, no other errors but my client froze when I clicked the chat button to reply to a friend. I could hear the queue dodge as I was banning, and after 15 seconds or so of being stuck the dump file error popped up and after pressing okay the client refreshed and unstuck.

This keeps happening to me in champion select, i just had it happen again and i just got into promos now im 97lp, last night same thing but i lost more.. isnt it possible to see its a client error not a dodge? I cant climb with this going on. Always error 183 how can i fix this?
trying what  xXLynchMobXx has suggested..refund my lost LP please!
Click on your desktop taskbar, then under the processes tab, right click the leagueclientUxrender.exe should be the tol one and simply choose create dump file

i have same problem
plz help me
shitty riot client. i'm having the same issue and many friends of mine are having the same problem. so fuckin annoying getting penalized for riots shitty spaghetti code. f

I get a full crash, and league takes about 45 seconds to close and restart. Happens about 1/4 or 1/5 games, almost always resulting in a dodge. This has gone on faaaaaaaar too long already Riot. Please fix this, I wont risk playing ranked until I wont auto dodge every fourth game.

Bumping this because I've had this problem for about a year now. It happens when I click too many things in champ select. Usually if I only pick a champ, ban, and lock in I don't get the error. However if i start chatting or messing with masteries the client will crash. I've stopped playing ranked because of this.

I've had it happen a few times when selecting different skins too, but since this is after lock in I can restart usually before the match begins...

I've had it happen out of champ select in the collections tab when of course viewing different champions or editing masteries. 

I just tried the right click in task manager on leagueclientUxrender.exe and creating a dump file hopefully it works.
I have this Problem too, I have lost too many LP duo to that!
someone help me game crashed (champ select ranked game) .. error 183

same problem here i lost my promotions because of this problem any suggetion to solve the it
please??
